translation.en: [woman] It's 2015, and people still act like marriage

translation.en: And she ain't cheap, but she is the superior blade.

translation.en: I think being a petite woman, you'll find the Miyabi easier to manage.

translation.en: [woman] I've managed to not eat lunch for six years

translation.en: just to have this joker call me petite.

translation.en: -Let her know we're officially registered. -Okay.

translation.en: [woman] Luke Harrison the Fourth played D1 lacrosse at Colgate,

translation.en: kite surfs on Nantucket,

translation.en: and skis in Vail because Aspen is lousy with the nouveau riche.
translation.zh: 在维尔滑雪 因为阿斯彭环境太差全是新晋权贵

translation.en: He calls me "babe" with the finest of intentions.
translation.zh: 他以最好的用意叫我“宝贝”

translation.en: -Let's go, babe. -Yeah.

translation.en: Heretofore, it is his birthright to marry a blond insect of Norwegian descent

translation.en: with a gender-ambiguous name, like Landry or Devon,

translation.en: who can spot my grift a mile away.

translation.en: Hey, can we get pizza?

translation.en: [woman] I'm not to the manor born,

translation.en: but I have something no trust fund can buy…

translation.en: the edge.
translation.zh: 优势

translation.en: It doesn't take much in Luke's world.

translation.en: Love your work, hate babies, even the cute ones,

translation.en: have a few lurid secrets,

translation.en: and be eternally grateful that Luke knows all of them and still loves me.

translation.en: [Luke] Um, my mom is asking if the invites went out.

translation.en: Mm. Yeah, once I approve the font.

translation.en: -Once you approve the font? -Yes.

translation.en: Oh. Once Ani approves the font.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[phone chimes]

translation.en: Oh, she's saying they should go out six weeks before.

translation.en: -Yeah, maybe just a box, please. -Sure.

translation.en: -Loo. -[Ani] Okay.

translation.en: [Ani] Someone once called me an animal.

translation.en: One wrong move and Luke will see it too.

translation.en: You can just take that. Thank you.

translation.en: Jesus. What happened?

translation.en: Waitress spilled soda all over the pizza and my dress.

translation.en: [Luke] Oh no.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: It's gonna be okay, babe. Okay?

translation.en: Come on, I'll help you.

translation.en: Baby, I love you.

translation.en: Oh! Oh my God. -I'm so full. -You hardly ate anything.

translation.en: [Ani] Okay, so maybe I keep some secrets from him,

translation.en: but no one has ever made me feel so safe.

translation.en: [Luke] I'm proud of you for eating carbs, babe.

translation.en: I wanna see every one of you dripping in sweat.
translation.zh: 我想看到你们每个人大汗淋漓

translation.en: Nothing is so bad that you can't do it for ten more seconds.

translation.en: -[traffic noise] -Ugh! Nineteen minutes? Some people have jobs to get to.

translation.en: I mean, not me, but some people.

translation.en: But I can't be late today.
translation.zh: 但我今天不能迟到

translation.en: Oh my God. Are you meeting the documentary director today?

translation.en: [Ani] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Okay, well, you're not gonna be late on my watch.

translation.en: [Ani] Nell Rutherford has been fostering me since freshman year of college.
translation.zh: 内尔·卢瑟福从大学一年级起就一直在培养我

translation.en: I know you never take the subway.

translation.en: Oh God, no, no, no. I-I really-- I really hate this.
translation.zh: 天啊 不行 我真的很讨厌这个

translation.en: Okay. By your side.
translation.zh: 好 我跟你一起

translation.en: [Ani] Nell is a natural blond with a trust fund.

translation.en: I'm a try-hard former financial-aid kid.
translation.zh: 我是以前接受经济援助的很努力的孩子

translation.en: We both hate where we came from.
translation.zh: 我们两个都讨厌自己的出身

translation.en: Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 哦 是的

translation.en: to try to find an outfit for my fitting at Saks Fifth Avenue on the 5th Avenue.
translation.zh: 试着帮我找一件去第五大道“萨克斯第五大道百货”试衣穿的衣服

translation.en: Wow, what is the opposite of a legend?

translation.en: Okay, I think this one is the most you.

translation.en: Would you pick it?

translation.en: I mean, I'm not getting married until we have a woman for president,

translation.en: so I guess we'll know soon enough.

translation.en: I, uh… I'm still scared I'm making a mistake.
translation.zh: 我… 我还是害怕自己会出错

translation.en: Getting married?
translation.zh: 结婚？

translation.en: No. No, like is Only You Pro the font of a trash slut
translation.zh: 不是 感觉“唯你专业”字体是一个不知道怎么递给别人

translation.en: who doesn't know how to pass the salt and pepper shakers together.
translation.zh: 盐和胡椒调料瓶的垃圾荡妇字体

translation.en: Oh my God, there is no such thing as a slutty font. It doesn't exist.

translation.en: God, I can't breathe.
translation.zh: 天啊 我无法呼吸了

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: [Ani] Oh my God. Oh my God.

translation.en: This is normal. Okay? This happens all the time.

translation.en: [conductor] We are experiencing a delay… -It's no big deal. -…due to train traffic ahead of us.
translation.zh: 我们由于前面的列车交通延误了

translation.en: Thank you for your patience.

translation.en: -You okay? -[power turns on] There we go. See?

translation.zh: -下一站 34街预兆广场-车开了

translation.en: -And we're moving. Okay. -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -下一站 34街预兆广场-车开了 -我的天-好

translation.en: to elevate the overly-sex fashion glossy where I work.

translation.en: I'm sure Luke's family would go in on them.

translation.en: [scoffs] Obsessed with Scully & Scully.

translation.en: My bedroom sconces are from there.

translation.en: like the wage gap and women in Afghanistan.

translation.en: So a recent study in the American Journal of Public Health
translation.zh: 《美国公共卫生杂志》一项最新研究

translation.en: found that last year, 30% of sexual assault survivors

translation.en: had to pay $940 for their own rape kits.

translation.en: That's a girl's whole paycheck.

translation.en: Right. So I was thinking
translation.zh: 对 所以我想用

translation.en: Oh! Lavender. Retch.

translation.en: Now that gets us on The Today Show.

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay.

translation.en: found that nasal breathing is optimal for sports performance
translation.zh: 发现鼻式呼吸最利于运动表现

translation.en: and is used by some of the top athletes around the world.
translation.zh: 被世界的一些顶级运动员使用

translation.en: So, "Five Weeks to an Olympian Blow Job:
translation.zh: 所以《五周训练奥林匹克吹箫运动》

translation.en: Breathe Like a Top Athlete
translation.zh: 《像顶级运动员一样呼吸

translation.en: to Last Longer and Go Deeper than His Ex."
translation.zh: 比他前任更持久、更深》

translation.en: When I count my blessings, I count you twice.
translation.zh: 我数自己遇见多少幸运的时候都把你算了两遍

translation.en: -Draft by the end of the week? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -周末前写完草稿？-好

translation.en: -Thank you, everyone. -[indistinct chatter]

translation.en: Come with me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: It's gonna be your name on the masthead of The New York Times Magazine.

translation.en: Lower than mine, but it beats a Cuisinart for a wedding gift.

translation.en: [Ani] I am this close to becoming Ani Harrison,

translation.en: senior editor at The New York Times Magazine,
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》的高级编辑

translation.en: to becoming someone people can respect.
translation.zh: 成为一个别人可以尊敬的人

translation.en: Abstaining from lunch allows me to squat in Eleanor's office when I need it.
translation.zh: 放弃吃午餐可以让我在需要的时候偷偷溜进埃莉诺的办公室

translation.en: One day, I'll have a corner office with my own insufferable display
translation.zh: 总有一天 我会有在角落的大办公室展示那些让人无法忍受的

translation.en: of prestigious and frankly phallic-looking awards.

translation.en: Until then, I pretend I'm important.
translation.zh: 在那之前 我会假装自己很重要

translation.en: The rock was Luke's grandmother's.
translation.zh: 这个珠宝是卢克祖母的

translation.en: Oh. Pardon me, his Nana's.

translation.en: He told me I could reset it in a diamond band,
translation.zh: 他说我可以把它重置在钻石手镯上

translation.en: what all the girls are doing now.

translation.en: Exactly why I will never.
translation.zh: 所以我才永远都不会这样做

translation.en: I intend to send a very clear message.
translation.zh: 我想传达一个非常明确的信息

translation.en: This is an heirloom.
translation.zh: 这是传家宝

translation.en: We don't just have money. We come from money.
translation.zh: 我们不仅有钱 祖上全都有钱

translation.en: -Take your best shot. -[door opens]

translation.en: Hey, Ani. Good to see you again.

translation.zh: 凯蒂 非常感谢你

translation.en: for the wage-gap story?

translation.en: [Ani] The smart story I just made up to sound more impressive.

translation.en: Ask Penelope.
translation.zh: 问问佩内洛普

translation.en: -Sit, please. -I appreciate you making the time.
translation.zh: -请坐-谢谢你抽出时间

translation.en: I know you said that the documentary was not the right choice at the moment,
translation.zh: 我知道你说纪录片现在不是最好的选择 我明白

translation.en: but there's been a pretty sizable development since the last time we spoke.
translation.zh: 但我们上次聊过之后又有了非常大的进展

translation.en: Your former classmate, Dean Barton, has signed on to be interviewed.
translation.zh: 你以前的同班同学迪恩·巴顿同意接受了采访

translation.en: [Ani] Keep it the fuck together, FaNelli.
translation.zh: 振作起来 法奈利

translation.en: I guess it shouldn't be a surprise he has a new book to promote.
translation.zh: 他有新书要宣传 所以这不意外

translation.en: I'm sure you saw his speech before Congress this summer.
translation.zh: 我相信你在看到了他今年夏天在国会面前的演讲

translation.en: [Ani] Only 200 times.
translation.zh: 也就看了200次吧

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Oh, it was a plea to tighten firearm background checks in Pennsylvania.
translation.zh: 哦 是为了加强宾州的枪支背景调查请愿

translation.en: [Ani] Your ring. Show him your ring.
translation.zh: 你的戒指 让他看看你的戒指

translation.en: I'm afraid I've been preoccupied this summer with planning the wedding
translation.zh: 恐怕我今年夏天会忙着计划婚礼

translation.en: and the magazine's initiative with Hillary's campaign.
translation.zh: 还有杂志要启动希拉里大选的事情

translation.en: I can't imagine what it's like to have people grilling you about it
translation.zh: 我无法想象这么多年后依然有人质问你

translation.en: so many years later.
translation.zh: 是什么感觉

translation.en: You're a survivor of the deadliest private-school shooting in history.
translation.zh: 你是最致命的私立学校枪击案的幸存者

translation.en: And the reason it continues to captivate public interest
translation.zh: 而它持续吸引公众兴趣的原因

translation.zh: 是因为有很多问题你从来没有回答

translation.en: I had absolutely nothing to do with it.

translation.en: -Then why does Dean say you did? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -那迪恩为什么说与你有关？-我不知道

translation.en: Don't you wanna tell your side of the story?

translation.en: -[door opens] -Miss FaNelli. Right at home, I see.

translation.en: I need three to five cover line tries for the simultaneous orgasm story
translation.zh: 我需要同时高潮那篇文章三到五个备选封面标题

translation.en: by the time I get back from lunch.
translation.zh: 在我回来之前搞定

translation.en: LoLo Vincent, editor-in-chief of The Women's Bible.
translation.zh: 萝萝·文森特 《女性圣经》主编

translation.en: Aaron Wickersham, independent filmmaker.

translation.zh: 好像我冤枉了他一样

translation.en: You know, to this day, I can't hold a knife in my hand without seeing his face.
translation.zh: 直到今天我每次拿刀都会想起他的脸

translation.en: [Aaron] My goodness, Ani.
translation.zh: 天啊 安妮

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Dinah] It's going to be fine.
translation.zh: 不会有事的

translation.en: You did a brave thing, TifAni.
translation.zh: 你做了一件勇敢的事 蒂芙安妮

translation.en: Please don't say that.
translation.zh: 请别这么说

translation.en: [girl 1] I can't believe she showed up. So disgusting.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信她出现了 好恶心

translation.en: [girl 2] Can you believe that?
translation.zh: 你能相信吗？

translation.en: [Ani] I didn't realize I walked into the funeral with a target on my back.
translation.zh: 我没意识到我去葬礼的时候背上背着所有人攻击的靶子

translation.en: Dean's version of events didn't exactly match mine.
translation.zh: 迪恩给大家说的故事版本跟我经历的不太一样

translation.en: [Aaron] And Dean's version of events was?
translation.zh: 迪恩版本的故事是？

translation.en: [Ani] That he didn't wanna be my boyfriend
translation.zh: 说在我和他以及他两个最好朋友睡了之后

translation.en: after I slept with him and his two best friends.
translation.zh: 他不想做我的男朋友

translation.en: That I was jilted.
translation.zh: 说我被抛弃了

translation.en: Due to TifAni having relationships with more than one of these boys…
translation.zh: 因为蒂芙安妮和不止一个男孩发生关系…

translation.en: [Ani] That I got my revenge by helping Ben and Arthur plan a massacre.
translation.zh: 说我帮助本和亚瑟计划一次大屠杀以此来报仇

translation.en: Hell have no fury like a woman scorned and whatnot.
translation.zh: 地狱不会像被侮辱的女人一样愤怒

translation.en: [cop] Let me escort you back to your car.
translation.zh: 我送你回车上

translation.en: [young Ani] Beth?
translation.zh: 贝丝？

translation.en: And for the grand finale, we were all gonna shoot ourselves.
translation.zh: 说最后的大结局是我们都会开枪打死自己

translation.en: Although only Ben managed to do that.
translation.zh: 虽然只有本真的这样做了

translation.en: You know, Dean was never gonna walk again,
translation.zh: 迪恩再也不会走路了

translation.en: so who would dare call him a liar?
translation.zh: 所以谁敢说他是骗子？

translation.en: [Dinah] Is it true?
translation.zh: 是真的吗？

translation.en: I had no idea Arthur was gonna do something like that--
translation.zh: 我根本不知道亚瑟会做什么…

translation.en: Not that part, the part about the boys!
translation.zh: 不是那部分是好几个男孩子那部分！

translation.en: [young Ani] I didn't want to, Mom.
translation.zh: 我并不想的 妈妈

translation.en: -I was drunk. They're lying. -Oh my God, TifAni.
translation.zh: -我喝多了 他们说谎-天啊 蒂芙安妮

translation.en: This is why I say no drinking!
translation.zh: 所以我才不让你喝酒！

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna call a lawyer as soon as I get home.
translation.zh: 我一到家就叫律师

translation.en: Oh, what are people gonna say?
translation.zh: 人们会怎么说？

translation.en: You're never charged as an accomplice. But… What about your claims against the boys?
translation.zh: 你从来没有被指控为共犯那你对男孩们的指控呢？

translation.en: Why didn't you file charges back then?
translation.zh: 你为什么没有起诉他们？

translation.en: I just thought they weren't worth pursuing.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得不值得在他们身上浪费时间

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: -Mom-- -[Dinah] No, TifAni.
translation.zh: -妈妈…-不 蒂芙安妮

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 不要说了

translation.en: -You disgust me. -[sobs]
translation.zh: 你让我恶心

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You are not the daughter that I raised.
translation.zh: 你不是我养大的女儿

translation.en: You're lucky you have a mother who got you a lawyer and supported you.
translation.zh: 你很幸运你有个母亲帮你找律师、支持你

translation.en: Not everyone has that.
translation.zh: 不是所有人都能有这份幸运

translation.en: Hmm. Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Very lucky.
translation.zh: 非常幸运

translation.en: Luckiest girl alive right here.
translation.zh: 是这里最幸运的活着的女孩了

translation.en: Do you wish your mother did more to help you?
translation.zh: 你希望你妈妈有多做点什么来帮助你吗？

translation.en: [Ani] I wish she hadn't looked at me like I was rode hard and put away wet.
translation.zh: 我希望她没把我看作别人泄欲后甩掉的小可怜

translation.en: Ani, do you wanna say more about that, or should I move on?
translation.zh: 你想再仔细说说这里还是我们继续？

translation.en: -Aaron, what the fuck? -Hi, Finny.
translation.zh: -艾伦 搞什么？-嗨 凡妮

translation.en: I swear, he's not supposed to be here until tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我发誓 他应该明天才来的

translation.en: -You need to get outta here. -[Dean] Wait.
translation.zh: -你需要出去-等等

translation.en: Finny, please. Just give me five minutes.
translation.zh: 凡妮 拜托 给我五分钟就好

translation.en: [Aaron] What are you doing here? This is not what we talked about.
translation.zh: 你来这里做什么？这不是我们说好的

translation.en: Ani, stay. Ani, don't go. He should be the one to go. I'm getting him outta here.
translation.zh: 安妮 留下 安妮 别走应该走的人是他

translation.en: -[Dean] Finny. -No, no. Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: -凡妮-不 别担心

translation.en: -[Aaron] Ani. -Please.
translation.zh: -安妮-拜托

translation.en: [Aaron] Ani, wait.
translation.zh: 安妮 等等

translation.en: Ani, wait. Ani. Don't let Dean run you out of here.
translation.zh: 安妮 等等 安妮别让迪恩把你逼出去

translation.en: Think about all the women you're gonna help by telling your story.
translation.zh: 想想你讲出你的故事后会帮助到的所有女性

translation.en: You're standing up for them too.
translation.zh: 你也在为她们鼓起勇气

translation.en: All the women will be fine.
translation.zh: 所有女人都会没事的

translation.en: [Ani] My mother insisted I stick it out at Brentley.
translation.zh: 我妈妈坚持要我在布伦特里学校读完

translation.en: It was a lonely two years.
translation.zh: 那是孤独的两年

translation.en: My classmates and I had survived this life-changing event
translation.zh: 我和我的同班同学经历了这个改变人生的事件 活了下来

translation.en: that few people could understand.
translation.zh: 很少有人能够理解

translation.en: They could lean on each other.
translation.zh: 他们可以互相依靠

translation.en: But I had no one.
translation.zh: 但我谁都没有

translation.en: My senior year, we took a field trip to New York City,
translation.zh: 我高三的那年 我们去纽约野外考察

translation.en: where I had this… experience.
translation.zh: 我有了这段…经历

translation.en: [woman] I don't need to impress him.
translation.zh: 我不需要打动他

translation.en: So do you know when the samples are actually arriving?
translation.zh: 所以你知道样本具体什么时候到吗？

translation.en: -You okay? -Sorry.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-抱歉

translation.en: No, the samples have to be there by Friday.
translation.zh: 不行 样本必须在周五之前送到

translation.en: Yes, Friday. Did you not schedule it?
translation.zh: 是的 周五 你没有安排吗？

translation.en: [Ani exhales] I'd never seen a woman like that before.
translation.zh: 我从没见过那样的女人

translation.en: A woman who threatened people on the phone,
translation.zh: 一个在电话上威胁别人的女人

translation.en: who could buy herself expensive things,
translation.zh: 可以给自己买昂贵东西的女人

translation.en: who cut a path through New York City simply because she looked like
translation.zh: 可以独自穿越纽约的女人只因为她看起来

translation.en: she had more important places to be than anyone else.
translation.zh: 比起其他所有人有更重要的地方要去

translation.en: I just had to get to that, I decided…
translation.zh: 我一定要变成那样 我决定…

translation.en: And no one could ever hurt me again.
translation.zh: 谁也不会再伤害到我

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: -[Luke] Who wants another one? -[man 1] Yeah, grab me one.
translation.zh: -谁还要？-好 给我拿一个

translation.en: [Luke] One, two, three, four more?
translation.zh: 再拿一、二、三、四个？

translation.en: -[man 2] Yes, sir. Thank you. -[man 3] Here we go, boys.
translation.zh: -是的 先生 谢谢-好了 孩子们

translation.en: [man 1] There it is. I told you.
translation.zh: 来了 我告诉你了

translation.en: -You're home. -[men] Yeah!
translation.zh: -你回来了-耶！

translation.en: -[Ani] Yeah. -[men laughing]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I left.
translation.zh: 我离开了

translation.en: I'm done.
translation.zh: 我受够了

translation.en: It just, um…
translation.zh: 只是…

translation.en: It just didn't feel right.
translation.zh: 只是感觉不对

translation.en: You know, I'm thinking about actually writing something myself.
translation.zh: 我其实在想 自己写点什么

translation.en: Get it out of my system that way.
translation.zh: 那样把这件事从我的系统里放出来

translation.en: I think that's really smart.
translation.zh: 真聪明

translation.en: You want a drink?
translation.zh: 你想喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Martini, straight up, three olives, no vermouth.
translation.zh: 马提尼 不加冰三个橄榄 不放苦艾酒

translation.en: -Vodka, olives coming right up. -Okay.
translation.zh: -伏特加、橄榄马上来-好吧

translation.en: Thank you for your service.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的服务

translation.en: Please don't be mad, but I think I'm moving to London.
translation.zh: 拜托别生气 我想我要搬去伦敦了

translation.en: [exhales sharply] You think?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, guess what? I am mad, so deal with it.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我生气了 你自己解决

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: I've written something.
translation.zh: 我写了一些东西

translation.en: You think The Times would want it?
translation.zh: 你觉得《纽约时报》会想要吗？

translation.en: You know what I wish I knew 38 years ago?
translation.zh: 你知道我希望自己38年前知道什么吗？

translation.en: It's a lot easier to be angry with the guy.
translation.zh: 对那个人生气更容易

translation.en: My high school boyfriend…
translation.zh: 我的高中男朋友…

translation.en: could be creative.
translation.zh: 有很多创意

translation.en: I'm sorry, LoLo.
translation.zh: 抱歉 萝萝

translation.en: [sighs] It's all right. There's no need to make a scene.
translation.zh: 没关系 没必要闹大

translation.en: Your guys, I mean, they rot in the ground or whatever,
translation.zh: 这些人可以烂在地下或者随便他们怎样

translation.en: but the people who love you,
translation.zh: 但是爱你的那些人

translation.en: who failed you so miserably,
translation.zh: 不幸让你失望的人

translation.en: stop trying to protect them with this vague half-assery,
translation.zh: 不要试图用这么含糊其辞的语言保护他们

translation.en: and you might actually have something there.
translation.zh: 那样你才能写出点东西

translation.en: But for now, let me be perfectly clear,
translation.zh: 但是现在 让我给你说清楚

translation.en: an approximation of honesty
translation.zh: 近似诚实

translation.en: doesn't make the cut at the paper of record.
translation.zh: 是不行的 无法进入《纽约时报》

translation.en: So, you know, take another swing at it.
translation.zh: 所以 你知道 再试一次

translation.en: Write it like no one will ever read it.
translation.zh: 写得让大家眼前一亮

translation.en: Not Luke, not your musty in-laws, definitely not your parents.
translation.zh: 卢克没看过 铜臭味的婆家没看过你父母绝对也没看过

translation.en: That is how you write something worth reading.
translation.zh: 这样才能写出值得一读的东西

translation.en: I mean, no one's making you write about it.
translation.zh: 没人逼你写这个

translation.en: I mean, go to London. Go live your life with Luke.
translation.zh: 去伦敦吧 去和卢克过你们的日子

translation.en: Just decide something.
translation.zh: 你做出决定

translation.en: Decide.
translation.zh: 决定好

translation.en: I'm… I'm trying.
translation.zh: 我… 我在努力

translation.en: Look, I'll make it very simple for you.
translation.zh: 听着 我来让你省点事

translation.en: You just say what it is that you want,
translation.zh: 你就说出来你想怎样

translation.en: not what everyone else wants,
translation.zh: 不是其他任何人怎样

translation.en: and then you do that.
translation.zh: 然后你按照那个做

translation.en: -If you tell anyone what I just told you-- -I won't.
translation.zh: -如果你把我刚才说的告诉任何人…-我不会的

translation.en: No, about it being 38 years since I was a teenager,
translation.zh: 说我38年前是青少年

translation.en: I will hunt you down and make you eat a carb.
translation.zh: …我一定会追杀你 让你吃碳水

translation.en: I had a choice to make on that day.
translation.zh: 我那天有一个决定要做

translation.en: I could blame the world for what happened to me,
translation.zh: 因为发生在我身上的事情而责怪这个世界

translation.en: or I could find the opportunity.
translation.zh: 或者我可以找到机会

translation.en: Every challenge, every heartache,
translation.zh: 每一次挑战 每一次心痛

translation.en: every tragedy in life
translation.zh: 生命中的每一个悲剧

translation.en: offers an opportunity to do something different,
translation.zh: 都给我机会 让我改变之前的做法

translation.en: to do something kind.
translation.zh: 去做好事

translation.en: [whispers] I told you. So inspiring, right?
translation.zh: 我跟你说了 太鼓舞人心了 对吧？

translation.en: I haven't heard a word he's said. [laughs]
translation.zh: 他说的话 我一个字都没听进去

translation.en: -…no one can ever take away that choice. -[woman] Shh.
translation.zh: …没有人能夺走那个选择

translation.en: [softly] Look, I could admit that I lied about your involvement in the shooting.
translation.zh: 听我说 我可以承认说你参与枪击 是我说谎了

translation.en: I was young a-and scared, confused.
translation.zh: 我那个时候年纪小很害怕 很困惑

translation.en: People will understand that.
translation.zh: 大家会理解的

translation.en: But… I don't know how the hell I'm gonna explain what happened with us.
translation.zh: 但是…我不知道该怎么解释我们之间发生的事情

translation.en: I have a wife.
translation.zh: 我有妻子

translation.en: [Ani] Three, two--
translation.zh: 三、二…

translation.en: Daughters.
translation.zh: 几个女儿

translation.en: Mmm. Right at the buzzer.
translation.zh: 倒计时结束

translation.en: And this would destroy them.
translation.zh: 这会毁掉她们的

translation.en: But me, I was fair game?
translation.zh: 但是对我来说 就公平吗？

translation.en: I was just trying to get out ahead of you.
translation.zh: 我只是想抢先一步

translation.en: I was scared that you'd tell the cops about that night at my house.
translation.zh: 我怕你会告诉警察那天晚上在我家发生的事情

translation.en: Plus, I was stuck in this, and you weren't.
translation.zh: 而且我被困在轮椅上 而你没有

translation.en: So I was so angry at you.
translation.zh: 所以我很生你的气

translation.en: Do you know the difference between me and someone like you, Dean?
translation.zh: 你知道我跟你这样的人之间的区别吗 迪恩？

translation.en: Between me and an Arthur?
translation.zh: 在我和亚瑟之间？

translation.en: Because I was angry too, so fucking angry you wouldn't believe it.
translation.zh: 因为我也生气 生气到你无法相信

translation.en: But my anger is like carbon monoxide.
translation.zh: 可是我的怒气就像一氧化碳

translation.en: It's odorless, tasteless, colorless, and completely toxic
translation.zh: 没有气味、没有味道、没有颜色又有剧毒

translation.en: but only to me.
translation.zh: 但只是对我

translation.en: See, I don't take my anger out on anyone other than my fucking self.
translation.zh: 看 我不会把我的愤怒发泄在别人身上 只会伤害自己

translation.en: [whispers] I didn't mean for it to happen like that.
translation.zh: 我并不想变成那样的

translation.en: I was… drunk, you know?
translation.zh: 我喝多了 你知道吗？

translation.en: I didn't even understand that that is what I was doing.
translation.zh: 我都无法理解那是我能做出来的事情

translation.en: Not when I was crying?
translation.zh: 我哭的时候 你也没反应过来吗？

translation.en: Not when I was begging you to wait. Wait.
translation.zh: 我求你等一等的时候你也没反应过来吗？

translation.en: Wait, like we were gonna… we were gonna talk about it, figure it out.
translation.zh: 等一下 我说我们要谈一谈 想想办法

translation.en: Do you know that every time I start to feel
translation.zh: 你知道每次我对自己感觉好一点的时候

translation.en: just a little bit good about myself, I remember that I begged…
translation.zh: 你知道每次我对自己感觉好一点的时候 我记得我求你…

translation.en: and there that goes.
translation.zh: 却没有任何用处

translation.en: If you talk about that night, I'll deny it…
translation.zh: 如果你聊起那晚 我会否认…

translation.en: and I'll double down on my claim that you planned it with Arthur and Ben.
translation.zh: 我会双倍下注称你是与亚瑟和本计划好的

translation.en: And there's a lot of people that are gonna believe me.
translation.zh: 有很多人会相信我

translation.en: Are you seriously trying to threaten me right now?
translation.zh: 你真的现在还要威胁我吗？

translation.en: I'm trying to offer you a deal.
translation.zh: 我是想跟你做个交易

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: You don't talk about what happened that night.
translation.zh: 你不提那晚发生的事

translation.en: And I'll say you had nothing to do with the shooting.
translation.zh: 我就说你跟枪击案没有关系

translation.en: There it is.
translation.zh: 真是一点都没变

translation.en: Look, I know I was an asshole back then,
translation.zh: 我知道我那时候是个混蛋

translation.en: but I have made it my mission to make up for that every day.
translation.zh: 但我每天都致力于弥补那些

translation.en: Does that… Does that not count for anything?
translation.zh: 那些… 那些都没有任何意义吗？

translation.en: [Dean] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: See, I was a victim too…
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我也是受害者…

translation.en: but no one ever treated me like one.
translation.zh: 但从来没有人把我当成受害者

translation.en: So let's just stop with your self-pitying bullshit.
translation.zh: 所以你就别再顾影自怜了

translation.en: Do you know how many times I've said the word "rape" in my life?
translation.zh: 你知道我这辈子说过多少次“强奸”这个词吗？

translation.en: I know, I fucking hate that word too. Makes me wanna peel my skin off.
translation.zh: 我知道 我也讨厌那个词让我想剥自己的皮

translation.en: I wonder if you've ever used it,
translation.zh: 我怀疑你一次都没有说过

translation.en: even once.
translation.zh: 一次都没有

translation.en: Probably not.
translation.zh: 可能没有

translation.en: Probably not.
translation.zh: 可能没有

translation.en: So I'm gonna sit here and watch you squirm
translation.zh: 所以我要坐在这里看着你羞愧难当

translation.en: while you make it a part of your vocabulary.
translation.zh: 让你说出这个词汇

translation.en: [whispers] Fine.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You win.
translation.zh: 你赢了

translation.en: I, uh…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I raped you.
translation.zh: 强奸了你

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: [fan] It's really just an honor to meet you.
translation.zh: 能见到你真是我的荣幸

translation.en: Um, thank you so much. You're such an inspiration.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 你真的很励志

translation.en: [Ani] So I'm gonna sit here and watch you squirm
translation.zh: 所以我要坐在这里看着你羞愧难当

translation.en: while you make it a part of your vocabulary.
translation.zh: 让你说出这个词汇

translation.en: [Dean] Fine. You win.
translation.zh: 好吧 你赢了

translation.en: I, uh…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I raped you.
translation.zh: 我强奸了你

translation.en: Need a lift?
translation.zh: 需要帮你一把吗？

translation.en: [Ani] Good riddance, TifAni FaNelli,
translation.zh: 再见了 蒂芙安妮·法奈利

translation.en: welcome, Ani Harrison.
translation.zh: 你好 安妮·哈里森

translation.en: [Ani] You belong here.
translation.zh: 你属于这里

translation.en: You do.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm sorry. One second.
translation.zh: 抱歉 等一下

translation.en: Yeah. Of course.
translation.zh: 对 当然了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Yeah. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢

translation.en: [gasps] Oh my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: -Um, I'll… I'll catch up with you. -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -我晚点再跟你聊-好

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Can we go talk?
translation.zh: 我们可以去聊聊吗？

translation.en: This is running in The New York Times?
translation.zh: 这篇文章要上《纽约时报》？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: How could you not tell me about this?
translation.zh: 你怎么能不告诉我？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I guess I… I just don't understand. I…
translation.zh: 我真的不明白 我…

translation.en: I always thought you had moved on from all this.
translation.zh: 我以为这一切在你心里已经过去了

translation.en: I admired you for that. I thought you were so tough.
translation.zh: 因为这点 我很尊敬你我觉得你很坚强

translation.en: So tough that I try to skip the part where I hurt about this?
translation.zh: 坚强到可以忽略我在这件事情中受到的伤害？

translation.en: No. Until I do that, I'm just a fraud.
translation.zh: 不 在我释怀之前 都是装出来的

translation.en: Fine, but can't you work that out privately?
translation.zh: 好吧 你就不能私下解决这件事吗？

translation.en: Do you have to get into the nitty-gritty details for the whole world?
translation.zh: 你一定要把这件事中的所有细节都呈现给整个世界吗？

translation.en: Those guys… were going around making fun of the shape of my pubic hair.
translation.zh: 那些人到处嘲弄我阴毛的形状

translation.en: They were making fun of the sounds I was making.
translation.zh: 嘲弄我发出的声音

translation.en: -So yes, the nitty-gritty matters to me. -They're dead.
translation.zh: -所以 对 那些细节对我很重要-他们都死了

translation.en: And one of them is in a wheelchair. Haven't they paid for their mistakes?
translation.zh: 还有一个坐了轮椅 他们没有因为自己的错误付出代价吗？

translation.en: -Their mistakes? -They fucked up. I'm agreeing with you.
translation.zh: -错误？-他们做得不对 这一点我认同你

translation.en: No, no, no. A-- A fuck-up is when you take your parent's car without permission
translation.zh: 不 做得不对是形容你未经父母允许开车出去

translation.en: and… and scratch the paint.
translation.zh: 把车漆刮伤了

translation.en: A fuck-up doesn't even begin to encompass what they did to me.
translation.zh: 做得不对根本无法涵盖他们对我做的所有事情

translation.en: Ani, it's our fucking rehearsal dinner.
translation.zh: 安妮 这是我们的彩排晚宴

translation.en: How are we talking about this right now?
translation.zh: 我们现在怎么能谈论这个？

translation.en: God! You used to be so different. You used to be so fun.
translation.zh: 天啊 你以前很不一样你以前很有趣

translation.en: -Fun? -Yes, fun.
translation.zh: -有趣？-是的 很有趣

translation.en: We used to have fun together. I miss that.
translation.zh: 我们曾在一起拥有乐趣我很想念那段时光

translation.en: I don't know if I'm fun.
translation.zh: 我不知道我是否有趣

translation.en: I don't know what's me
translation.zh: 我不知道哪部分自己是真实的

translation.en: and what part I invented to make people like me.
translation.zh: 哪部分是我刻意制造的为了让人们喜欢我

translation.en: God, I used to be so proud of that. I-I…
translation.zh: 天啊 我以前对此那么骄傲 我…

translation.en: I thought it was this chameleon who was so much smarter than everyone.
translation.zh: 我以为自己是条变色龙比所有人都聪明

translation.en: [sobs] So much smarter that I don't even know a thing about myself.
translation.zh: 聪明到我都不认识自己了

translation.en: Hey, hey. I don't believe that.
translation.zh: 喂 我不相信那些

translation.en: -We can get back there. Hey, stop. -[Ani sobs]
translation.zh: 你可以找回自己的 别哭了

translation.en: We can get back there.
translation.zh: 我们可以回到过去

translation.en: I love you. You love me. We can figure it out.
translation.zh: 我爱你 你爱我 我们可以一起解决

translation.en: [Ani] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Do you remember the time you said you felt like a box
translation.zh: 你还记得你说过感觉自己是我要完成的

translation.en: that I just checked off?
translation.zh: 一件事吗？

translation.en: I do love you…
translation.zh: 我是真的爱你…

translation.en: But I've been using you. [whimpers]
translation.zh: 但我一直在利用你

translation.en: I resent you.
translation.zh: 我怨恨你

translation.en: It's not… It's not fair.
translation.zh: 这就像… 这不公平

translation.en: You're not the one who hurt me, but I… but I take it out on you.
translation.zh: 你不是伤害我的人但我却发泄在你身上

translation.en: -I've never felt like you resent me. -Because I'm like a wind-up doll.
translation.zh: -我从没感觉到你对我的怨恨-因为我就像个发条娃娃一样

translation.en: Turn my key, and I'll tell you exactly what you wanna hear.
translation.zh: 转动我的钥匙你想听什么 我都会告诉你

translation.en: I have denied myself and denied myself. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 我一直不断否认自己

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: I'm not hurt.
translation.zh: 我没有受伤

translation.en: And it has… it has built up this rage inside of me.
translation.zh: 这让我内心逐渐积攒了愤怒

translation.en: Look, I… I should've faced up to all of this sooner.
translation.zh: 听着 我应该更早面对这一切的

translation.en: I… I just think that I need to do it now
translation.zh: 我只是觉得我需要现在来做

translation.en: without worrying about what you or anyone else thinks about it.
translation.zh: 不用担心你或者其他人对此怎样想

translation.en: Is this really happening right now?
translation.zh: 你真要现在这样吗？

translation.en: [Ani] It's like LoLo said,
translation.zh: 就像萝萝说的

translation.en: an approximation of honesty won't make the cut.
translation.zh: 近似诚实是不行的

translation.en: And that's what I had with Luke.
translation.zh: 这就是我跟卢克之间的情况

translation.en: I hate that I hurt him,
translation.zh: 我讨厌自己伤害了他

translation.en: but this is where I belong.
translation.zh: 但这里才是属于我的地方

translation.en: This is what I always wanted.
translation.zh: 这是我一直想要的

translation.en: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't suffering
translation.zh: 如果我说自己没有轻微的幻肢综合症

translation.en: from a mild case of phantom limb syndrome.
translation.zh: 那一定是在说谎

translation.en: But maybe things are brighter without it.
translation.zh: 但或许没有 事情会更明朗

translation.en: "If you read one thing today,
translation.zh: “如果你今天读了一篇文章

translation.en: it should be Ani FaNelli's essay in New York Times Magazine."
translation.zh: 那应该是安妮·法奈利在《纽约时报》上的文章”

translation.en: "I sent it to every woman I know, and so should you!"
translation.zh: “我发给了我认识的每一位女性你也应该发！”

translation.en: -[laughter] -[Nell] Oh, Dean Barton is so fucked!
translation.zh: 迪恩·巴顿太恶心了！

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -Ooh! Get up! -I'm up!
translation.zh: -起来-我起来了

translation.en: You're going viral!
translation.zh: 你文章火了！

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Ugh! Wait, do you… do you have any OJ?
translation.zh: -我的天啊-等等 你有橙汁吗？

translation.en: [Ani] Yeah, I keep the Sunny D in the side door.
translation.zh: 对 我在冰箱侧门一直放便宜的橙汁

translation.en: She's a funny writer girl.
translation.zh: 真是个有趣的作家姑娘

translation.en: Look it!
translation.zh: 你看！

translation.en: -[squeals] -Look at this!
translation.zh: -看这个！-你看起来很美

translation.en: Ah! I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲

translation.en: [commenter 1] I just finished reading your piece and am utterly haunted.
translation.zh: 我刚读完你的文章让我回想起了自己的经历

translation.en: Thank you for speaking up.
translation.zh: 谢谢你发声

translation.en: From someone who has always felt like no one would listen to her anyway.
translation.zh: 来自一个总觉得没有人会听信自己的人

translation.en: [commenter 2] I cried reading your essay.
translation.zh: 我看你的文章看哭了

translation.en: Thank you for putting it out into the world.
translation.zh: 谢谢你把这件事情揭发给整个世界

translation.en: [commenter 3] I was also assaulted by a guy I thought was a friend.
translation.zh: 我也被一位我以为的朋友性侵了

translation.en: Hearing your story gives me hope that one day I can tell mine too.
translation.zh: 听到你的故事给了我希望或许我有一天也会讲出自己的故事

translation.en: [commenter 4] I was raped while completely unconscious.
translation.zh: 我在完全昏迷的时候被强奸了

translation.en: The lines about coming to
translation.zh: 你文章中的描述

translation.en: hit me so hard.
translation.zh: 引起了我强烈的共鸣

translation.en: [commenter 5] I never told anyone,
translation.zh: 我从来没有告诉任何人

translation.en: not even my husband.
translation.zh: 包括我的丈夫

translation.en: [Ani] When I sat down to write this essay, the goal was to avenge my reputation,
translation.zh: 当我坐下写这篇文章的时候目标是为我的名誉复仇

translation.en: maybe stick it to the people who hurt me.
translation.zh: 或许就是让伤害我的那些人看看

translation.en: But it's become so much more than that.
translation.zh: 但它的意义远远不止如此

translation.en: -Ani. So nice to meet you. -So much more than me.
translation.zh: -安妮 很高兴见到你-远超出了我自身

translation.en: Of course. Thank you.
translation.zh: 当然了 谢谢

translation.en: [Rachel] Now, I read your op-ed…
translation.zh: 现在我读了你的文章…

translation.en: [Ani] It's about the importance of all of us speaking freely,
translation.zh: 重要的是我们所有人能自由说话

translation.en: even if people wanna silence us.
translation.zh: 即使有人想让我们沉默

translation.en: So that we can become the kind of women our younger selves would admire.
translation.zh: 让我们能成为年轻时的我们钦佩的那种女人

translation.en: I'm hearing from women who have never shared their stories,
translation.zh: 我听到了很多女性的反馈很多人从来没有分享她们的故事

translation.en: from women who have carried this horrible thing
translation.zh: 有的女性心里藏着这件恐怖的事情

translation.en: with them alone for 38 years,
translation.zh: 独自一人承受了38年

translation.en: and I just hope that no one has to ever do that again.
translation.zh: 我只希望其他人不用再这样做了

translation.en: I hope that people feel compelled to share their stories,
translation.zh: 我希望人们愿意分享她们的故事

translation.en: to talk about what happened to them,
translation.zh: 聊聊自己身上发生了什么

translation.en: and to know that you have nothing to be ashamed of.
translation.zh: 能够明白你不应该为任何事情感到羞愧

translation.en: [Rachel] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Ani, thank you so much for being here.
translation.zh: 安妮 非常感谢你来做客

translation.en: -Of course. -[Rachel] Truly inspiring story.
translation.zh: -没问题-真正鼓舞人心的故事

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: TifAni FaNelli, right?

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Sarah Gardener. I cover public health for Bloomberg.

translation.en: [Ani] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Gun control is under my domain.

translation.en: I've covered Dean Barton's career quite extensively.

translation.en: He's helped a lot of people over the years.
translation.zh: 这些年来 他帮助了很多人

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Let's hope your 15 minutes of fame will too.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm so sorry. I…
translation.zh: 不好意思 抱歉 我…

translation.en: -It's Sarah Gard-- -That's okay.
translation.zh: -是莎拉· 葛德…-没关系

translation.en: I'll just remember you as the woman I told to go fuck herself on 5th Avenue.
translation.zh: 我就把你记成是 我在第五大道上说让你去死的那个女人

translation.en: [Ani] Gotta work on that delivery, FaNelli, but fuck that felt good.
